project_name: Lynx – Storage Provider Retrieval Analytics Platform
filecoin_growth_impact:
Lynx strengthens Filecoin’s data economy by improving the visibility and accountability of retrieval performance:
	•	Supports allocators managing over 50 PiB of verified data by ensuring measurable reliability metrics.
	•	Provides open APIs used in governance, client onboarding, helping direct FIL-denominated transactions toward proven, reliable SPs.
	•	By quantifying retrieval trust, Lynx encourages sustainable demand for high-performance SPs.
description: Lynx measures Storage Providers’ real-world retrieval performance across HTTP, Graphsync, and Bitswap using DDO-backed randomized SubPiece sampling. Since Nov 2024, it has delivered an end-to-end pipeline, public dashboards, and APIs that enable SPs and integrators to track SLA compliance and retrieval success rates globally.
additional_impact: Established a common benchmark for retrieval SLA measurement used across multiple ecosystem tools.
end_user:
Lynx primarily serves Storage Providers (SPs), allocators, and ecosystem developers who need reliable retrieval performance data.
	•	SPs use Lynx dashboards and APIs to monitor their retrieval success rates, latency, and SLA compliance across protocols (HTTP, Graphsync, Bitswap).
	•	Allocators and governance reviewers rely on Lynx reports to validate data reliability before approving DataCap.
	•	Developers and integrators use Lynx APIs to enhance routing, client-side reliability scoring, and data audit workflows.
testimonials:
Lynx has received 10+ positive testimonials from SP operators, tooling developers, and allocators.
	•	Multiple SPs confirmed that Lynx helped them identify region-specific latency issues and improve retrieval SLAs.
	•	Tooling teams integrating Lynx API reported faster retrieval analytics and better reliability reporting.
how_many_package_downloads: Lynx SDK and API utilities have been downloaded and deployed over 100 times since launch, primarily by SP tool developers and data governance dashboards.
how_many_dependents: fil+team, foc project, spark, fidl, pdp
